articles.title: AFC Asian Cup: India football full schedule, match timings, live streaming - Business Standard
articles.description: The Indian football team is set to begin their campaign against Australia on January 13. Jio Cinemas will livestream AFC Asian Cup matches in India.
articles.content:

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Comeback man Nagal completes sensational return to Australian Open main draw - Hindustan Times
articles.description: This will be Nagal's second main draw appearance at the Australian Open, first in three years, and fourth overall at a Grand Slam tournament. | Tennis News
articles.content: Indian tennis star Sumit Nagal continued his sensational return to the sport on Friday as he qualified for the 2024 Australian Open main draw after a gritty 6-4, 6-4 win against Alex Molcan of Slovak… [+2216 chars]
